TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileService extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许通过 Web 服务访问 ASP.NET 用户配置文件。

span.span: Enables access to ASP.NET user profiles through a Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你能够获取和设置通过 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的用户的配置文件属性。The class enables you to get and set a user's profile properties through a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service. 你可以保留配置文件属性通过为用户的自定义信息。You can keep custom information for users through profile properties. 有关配置文件属性的信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For information about profile properties, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 类包含以下方法应仅通过 WCF 服务访问：The class contains the following methods that should be accessed only through a WCF service: - - - - 若要调用这些方法，必须启用 Web 服务器上的配置文件服务，然后 WCF 兼容客户端应用程序连接到 Web 服务。To call these methods, you must enable the profile service on the Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service. 有关如何配置配置文件服务的信息，请参阅[如何： 启用 WCF 配置文件服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/46a16bc2-8c01-4eed-aed9-2286c85f094a)。For information about how to configure the profile service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Profile Service](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/46a16bc2-8c01-4eed-aed9-2286c85f094a). 设置用户的配置文件属性时引发事件。The event is raised when a user's profile properties are set. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件以验证属性值也可动态更改其值。You can create an event handler for the event to validate property values or to dynamically change their values. 有关如何使用 WCF 配置文件服务的控制台应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 使用 ASP.NET 应用程序服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb)。For an example of how to use the WCF profile service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, object> GetAllPropertiesForCurrentUser(bool authenticatedUserOnly) cil managed
Public Function GetAllPropertiesForCurrentUser (authenticatedUserOnly As Boolean) As Dictionary(Of String, Object)

param.name: authenticatedUserOnly
param.span: 指示是否仅为已经过身份验证的用户返回属性的一个值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether properties are returned only for users who have been authenticated.

summary.span: 检索可用于当前用户配置文件服务的所有配置文件属性和值。

span.span: Retrieves all the profile properties and values that are available to the profile service for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索通过一个 Web 服务调用的所有用户配置文件属性。Use the method to retrieve all the user's profile properties through one Web service call. 例如，你可调用此方法且然后将配置文件属性存储在客户端应用程序和检索值，根据需要。For example, you can call this method and then store the profile properties in the client application and retrieve values as needed. 方法返回仅对已配置为通过 Web 服务访问的配置文件属性的值。The method returns values only for the profile properties that have been configured to be accessed through a Web service. 可设置是否可以通过设置通过 Web 服务访问配置文件属性属性或属性`true`。You set whether a profile property can be accessed through a Web service by setting either the property or the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, object> GetPropertiesForCurrentUser(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> properties, bool authenticatedUserOnly) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertiesForCurrentUser (properties As IEnumerable(Of String), authenticatedUserOnly As Boolean) As Dictionary(Of String, Object)

param.name: properties
param.span: 包含要检索的配置文件属性名称的字符串值的集合。

span.span: A collection of string values that contains the names of the profile properties to retrieve.

param.name: authenticatedUserOnly
param.span: 指示是否仅为已经过身份验证的用户返回属性的一个值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether properties are returned only for users who have been authenticated.

summary.span: 检索当前用户的指定配置文件属性和值。

span.span: Retrieves the specified profile properties and values for the current user.

returns.span: 配置文件属性信息和值。

span.span: The profile property information and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的当前用户的特定配置文件属性值，请使用方法，以指定检索的配置文件属性。To get specific profile property values for the current users, you use the method to specify which profile properties are retrieved. 方法返回仅为配置为通过 Web 服务的访问的配置文件属性的值。The method returns values only for profile properties that are configured for access through a Web service. 通过设置来配置通过 Web 服务的访问的配置文件属性属性或属性`true`。You configure a profile property for access through a Web service by setting the property or property to `true`.

exception.span: 集合中的 参数或项为 。

span.span: The parameter or an item in the collection is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfilePropertyMetadata[] GetPropertiesMetadata() cil managed

summary.span: 检索有关可通过配置文件服务使用的配置文件属性的信息。

span.span: Retrieves information about the profile properties that are available through the profile service.

returns.span: 一个 对象的数组，这些对象包含有关配置文件属性的信息。

span.span: An array of objects that contain information about the profile properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检索有关配置文件属性的信息从客户端应用程序与 Windows Communication Framework (WCF) 兼容。Use the method to retrieve information about profile properties from a client application that is compatible with the Windows Communication Framework (WCF). 你可以检索信息如下所示：You can retrieve information such as the following: - 名称和类型的属性。The name and type of the properties. - 它们是否是只读的。Whether they are read-only. - 是否可以访问它们由未经身份验证的用户。Whether they can be accessed by users who have not been authenticated. - 属性的默认值。The default values for the properties. 在检索这些值之后, 客户端应用程序可能需要相应的操作，如不会尝试设置只读属性。After retrieving these values, a client application can take appropriate actions such as not trying to set a read-only property. 当前用户没有要进行身份验证以调用方法，因为这些属性适用于所有用户。The current user does not have to be authenticated in order to call the method, because the properties apply to all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<string> SetPropertiesForCurrentUser(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> values, bool authenticatedUserOnly) cil managed
Public Function SetPropertiesForCurrentUser (values As IDictionary(Of String, Object), authenticatedUserOnly As Boolean) As Collection(Of String)

param.name: values
param.span: 包含要设置的配置文件属性的名称和值的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains names and values of the profile properties to set.

param.name: authenticatedUserOnly
param.span: 指示是否仅为已经过身份验证的用户设置属性的一个值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether properties are set only for users who have been authenticated.

summary.span: 在用户配置文件中设置指定属性的值。

span.span: Sets the values of the specified properties in the user profile.

returns.span: 没有为用户配置文件设置的属性（如果有）。

span.span: The properties that were not set for the user profile, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用方法以从使用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 兼容的应用程序中设置用户的配置文件属性。You use the method to set a user's profile properties from an application that is compatible with the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF). 方法返回的任何值未设置，这可能是由于以下原因之一：The method returns any values that are not set, which might be for any one of the following reasons: - 指定的配置文件属性为只读 (指定的配置文件属性的属性未设置为`true`)。The specified profile property is read only (the property for a specified profile property is not set to `true`). - 用户配置文件没有具有匹配名称的配置文件属性。The user profile does not have a profile property that has the matching name. - 值的验证失败。Validation of the value failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event ValidatingProperties As EventHandler(Of ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs)

summary.span: 当设置了用户的配置文件属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user's profile properties are set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件以验证属性值也可动态更改其值。You can create an event handler for the event to validate property values or to dynamically change their values. 引发事件时调用方法。The event is raised when the method is called. 如果值为一个属性未通过验证，将该属性添加到集合类。If the value for a property fails validation, add that property to the collection of the class. 中的任何属性集合将不会保存到的用户配置文件。Any properties that are in the collection will not be saved to the user profile. 你可以添加和在 Global.asax 文件中注册事件处理程序。You can add and register the event handler in the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 当为传递值`FirstName`属性为空或`null`、`FirstName`属性添加到集合。When the value passed for `FirstName` property is empty or `null`, the `FirstName` property is added to the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]
